activities.title: Dupatta of Blessings
activities.shortDescription: Repurposing temple dupattas into wedding veils for underprivileged brides.
activities.fullDescription: Our Dupatta of Blessings initiative transforms discarded temple dupattas into beautiful wedding veils for underprivileged brides. This sustainable practice not only reduces textile waste but also brings dignity and joy to special moments in people's lives.
activities.purpose: Reduces textile waste while spreading love and dignity through sustainable giving.
activities.impact: Encourages responsible reuse and inspires compassionate, waste-free celebrations.

activities.title: Flower Dhoops
activities.shortDescription: Turning discarded temple flowers into fragrant incense sticks.
activities.fullDescription: The Flower Dhoops project converts temple flower waste into aromatic incense sticks, preventing pollution of water bodies while creating useful products that enhance spiritual experiences in an eco-friendly manner.
activities.purpose: Prevents flower waste from polluting rivers and encourages mindful reuse of natural materials.
activities.impact: Reduces water pollution and supports sustainable livelihoods.

activities.title: DIY Candles
activities.shortDescription: Creating candles using leftover wax, coconut husks, and nut shells.
activities.fullDescription: Our DIY Candles workshop teaches participants to create beautiful, functional candles using waste materials like leftover wax, coconut husks, and nut shells, promoting creativity while reducing landfill waste.
activities.purpose: Promotes creativity and teaches how to recycle waste into something beautiful and useful.
activities.impact: Cuts down landfill waste and inspires everyday sustainable habits.

activities.title: Cloth to Toys
activities.shortDescription: Turning old fabrics into soft toys for children in need.
activities.fullDescription: The Cloth to Toys initiative transforms old fabric scraps into delightful soft toys for children in need, combining sustainability with social impact by bringing joy to underprivileged children while reducing textile waste.
activities.purpose: Blends sustainability with kindness — reducing waste while bringing joy.
activities.impact: Encourages textile reuse and spreads awareness about giving back to the community.

activities.title: Celebration Kits
activities.shortDescription: Eco-friendly kits with reusable décor, seed confetti, and cloth banners.
activities.fullDescription: Our Celebration Kits provide ready-to-use eco-friendly alternatives for festivities, including reusable decorations, biodegradable seed confetti, and cloth banners that make celebrations sustainable and guilt-free.
activities.purpose: Offers easy, ready-to-use alternatives for green celebrations.
activities.impact: Helps people make conscious choices and reduces single-use plastic waste.

activities.title: Upcycling Workshop
activities.shortDescription: Fun, interactive sessions on turning waste into décor and craft items.
activities.fullDescription: Our comprehensive Upcycling Workshops provide hands-on training in converting various waste materials into beautiful décor and functional craft items, empowering participants with skills for sustainable living.
activities.purpose: Builds awareness and hands-on skills to live more sustainably.
activities.impact: Sparks creativity and inspires long-term changes in how we view and handle waste.

activities.title: Community Garden Project
activities.shortDescription: Creating sustainable community gardens using composted organic waste.
activities.fullDescription: The Community Garden Project establishes green spaces in urban areas using composted organic waste, fostering community engagement while promoting sustainable food production and environmental awareness.
activities.purpose: Promotes urban sustainability and community building through gardening.
activities.impact: Reduces organic waste, improves air quality, and strengthens community bonds.

activities.title: Eco-Friendly Art Workshop
activities.shortDescription: Creating artwork using natural and recycled materials.
activities.fullDescription: Our Eco-Friendly Art Workshop encourages artistic expression using only natural and recycled materials, demonstrating that creativity and environmental consciousness can beautifully coexist.
activities.purpose: Combines artistic creativity with environmental consciousness.
activities.impact: Inspires sustainable art practices and environmental awareness through creativity.
